class.name: BracketingNthOrderBrentSolverDFPTest

javadoc.text: Test case for {@link BracketingNthOrderBrentSolverDFP bracketing n<sup>th</sup> order Brent} solver.

method.name: testNeta
method.comment: the following test functions come from Beny Neta's paper:
intern J. Computer Math Vol 23 pp 265-282
